00116 void CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::run()
00117 {
00118     // Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::run()...");
00119     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Modifying Probe Intensities with Covariate Signal Adjuster.");
00120     adjustSignals();
00121 }
00122 
00123 void CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::adjustSignals()
00124 {
00125     int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00126     int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00127     int numCovariates = getSignalCovariates().size();
00128     if (numCovariates == 0)
00129     {
00130         return;
00131     }
00132 
00133     // Check if any covariate values were read from the annotation file or covariates file
00134     if (getProbeSets()->getCount() > 0 && getProbeSets()->getAt(0)->getNumCovariates() == 0)
00135     {
00136         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("disable-covariates-file-warning") == false)
00137         {
00138             Verbose::warn(1, "Covariate adjustment is disabled. No covariate values were loaded. annotation-file does not support covariates.");
00139             m_pEngine->setOpt("disable-covariates-file-warning", "true");
00140         }
00141         return;
00142     }
00143 
00144     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::run()...");
00145     Verbose::progressBegin(3, "Run covariate signal adjustment", numCovariates*2, 1, numCovariates*2);
00146 
00147     // Find out if marker-class is one of the covariates
00148     int markerClassIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("marker-class");
00149 
00150     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data")) {
00151         writeIntensities("beforeCovariateAdjust");
00152     }
00153 
00154     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < numCovariates; ++iIndex)
00155     {
00156         int covIndex = getSignalCovariates()[iIndex];    // index into covariates vector in CNProbeSet
00157         int maxFlagIndex = 2;      // the default number of marker classes (i.e. SNP and CN)
00158         if (markerClassIndex == covIndex)
00159         {
00160             // This is the marker-class covariate, so do not distinguish SNP and CN in what follows
00161             maxFlagIndex = 1;      // do the loop below only once (i.e. it's one class of markers)
00162         }
00163         for (int markerClass = 0; markerClass < maxFlagIndex; ++markerClass)   // markerClass 0 = CN, 1 = SNP
00164         {
00165             string intermSuffix;
00166             if (maxFlagIndex == 1) {
00167                 intermSuffix = "_MARKER_CLASS";
00168             } else if (markerClass == 0) {
00169                 intermSuffix = "_CN";
00170             } else if (markerClass == 1) {
00171                 intermSuffix = "_SNP";
00172             } else {
00173                 intermSuffix = "_INVALID_FLAG";
00174             }
00175 
00176             vector<float> covValues;                 // corresponding covariates for binning
00177             vector<CNProbe*> probesToProcess;        // probe with valid iIndex'th covariate value
00178             vector<int> binning;                     // corresponding bin numbers
00179     
00180             Verbose::progressStep(3);
00181     
00182             for (int pIndex = 0; pIndex < getProbes()->getCount(); ++pIndex)
00183             {
00184                 CNProbe* pobjProbe = getProbes()->getAt(pIndex);
00185                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(pobjProbe->getProbeSetIndex());
00186                 // Collect probe sets with non-NaN covariate values
00187                 float covVal = pobjProbeSet->getCovariateValue(covIndex);
00188                     if ((maxFlagIndex == 1 || doesProcessFlagMatchMarkerClass(markerClass, pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag())) &&
00189                         !isNaN(covVal))
00190                 {
00191                     probesToProcess.push_back(pobjProbe);
00192                     covValues.push_back(covVal);
00193                 }
00194             }
00195     
00196             binning.assign(covValues.size(), -1);
00197             int numBins = determineBins(covValues, binning, iIndex);
00198             vector<int> histogram(numBins);
00199     
00200             // Collect the medians for the bins.
00201             // NB: medians of autosomes only.
00202             vector<float> medians;
00203             vector<float> allData;
00204             try
00205             {
00206                 for (int binIndex = 0; binIndex < numBins; ++binIndex)
00207                 {
00208                     vector<float> bData;
00209                     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probesToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
00210                     {
00211                         if (binIndex == 0) histogram[binning[iIndex]] += 1; // make histogram only while processing the first bin.
00212     
00213                         if (binning[iIndex] == binIndex)
00214                         {
00215                             CNProbeSet *pset = getProbeSets()->getAt(probesToProcess[iIndex]->getProbeSetIndex());
00216                             if (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome)
00217                             {
00218                                 float intensity = getIntensity(probesToProcess[iIndex]);
00219                                 if (!isNaN(intensity))
00220                                 {
00221                                     bData.push_back(intensity);
00222                                     allData.push_back(intensity);
00223                                 }
00224                             }
00225                         }
00226                     }
00227     
00228                     if (bData.size() > 0)
00229                     {
00230                         vector<float>::iterator iter = bData.begin() + bData.size()/2;
00231                         std::nth_element(bData.begin(), iter, bData.end());
00232                         medians.push_back(*iter);
00233                     }
00234                     else
00235                     {
00236                         medians.push_back(0.0);
00237                     }
00238                 }
00239             }
00240             catch(exception& e)
00241             {
00242                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00243             }
00244     
00245             // Compute the grand median - I onlyl have to do this once I should try another way
00246             vector<float>::iterator iter = allData.begin() + allData.size()/2;
00247             std::nth_element(allData.begin(), iter, allData.end());
00248             float grandMedian = *iter;
00249         
00250             // Adjust signal (note probe outside validProbes[] are not adjusted)
00251             for (int pIndex = 0; pIndex < probesToProcess.size(); ++pIndex)
00252             {
00253                 if (medians[binning[pIndex]] != 0.0)
00254                 {
00255                     float adjSignal = getIntensity(probesToProcess[pIndex]) * grandMedian / medians[binning[pIndex]];
00256                     if (!isNaN(adjSignal))
00257                     {
00258                         setAdjustedIntensity(probesToProcess[pIndex], adjSignal);
00259                     }
00260                 }
00261             }
00262             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00263             {
00264                 writeIntensities("afterCovariateAdjust_" + Convert::toString(iIndex+1) + intermSuffix);
00265                 writeMediansVectorAndMedian("covariateSignalMedians_" + Convert::toString(iIndex+1) + intermSuffix, medians, grandMedian);
00266             }
00267         }
00268     }
00269     Verbose::progressEnd(3, "Done.");
00270 }
00271 
00272 int CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::determineBins(vector<float>& covValues, vector<int>& binning, int covariateIndex)
00273 {
00274     if (CovariateParams::useEquallyPopulatedSignalBins(covariateIndex))
00275     {
00276         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumSignalBins(covariateIndex);
00277         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualNumber(covValues, binning, numBins);
00278         return numBins;
00279     }
00280     else if (CovariateParams::useEquallySpacedSignalBins(covariateIndex))
00281     {
00282         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumSignalBins(covariateIndex);
00283         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualSpacing(covValues, binning, numBins);
00284         return numBins;
00285     }
00286     else if (CovariateParams::isSignalCovariateDiscrete(covariateIndex))
00287     {
00288         return CNAnalysisMethod::covariateIsBinAssignment(covValues, binning);
00289     }
00290     else // unknown binning
00291     {
00292         // This is a late error.
00293         Err::errAbort("Unknown signal covariate binning type");
00294     }
00295     return 0;
00296 }
00297 
00298 std::vector<int>& CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::getSignalCovariates()
00299 {
00300     return CovariateParams::m_vSignalCovariates;
00301 }
